title: A novel μ3-CO3 bridged linear polymeric Cu-complex ([Cu3(DMAP)8(μ3-CO3)2]I2)n·xH2O: synthesis, characterization and catalytic applications in the synthesis of phenoxypyrimidines and arylthiopyrimidines via C–O and C–S cross-coupling reactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18478-18488
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00001C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Amar Jyoti Bhuyan, Partha Pratim Nath, Sourav Jyoti Bharali, Lakhinath Saikia
A new polymeric copper complex ([Cu3(DMAP)8(μ3-CO3)2]I2)n·xH2O is synthesized, characterized and used in C–O and C–S cross coupling reactions for the synthesis of biologically important phenoxypyrimidine and arylthiopyrimidine scaffolds.
